original_text: Therefore I urge you to take some food. For it will give you strength, for not a hair is to perish from the head of any of you.”
korean_text: 음식 먹기를 권하노니 이것이 너희의 구원을 위하는 것이요 너희 중 머리카락 하나도 잃을 자가 없으리라 하고

sentences.original_text: Therefore I urge you to take some food.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 너희에게 음식을 먹으라고 권하노라.

sentences.original_text: For it will give you strength,
for not a hair is to perish from the head of any of you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 머리카락 하나도 잃지 아니하리라.
